text: Confirm fake and is a scam call

I still rmb the other time I reported police coz got 1 guy sitting on the ledge outside my corridor past midnight  the IO called me & say it’s very late I don’t want to knock on ur door & wake ur family up. Ask me can open the door or not. 😂😂
Call me again at 6.41am 😅
Where got IO so hardworking one
Then 6.50am   police email me say my case assign to xxxx liao
That time my brother’s case kena 1 rude IO
Asked my cousin to settle him lol
If its real   he must be wondering y i no pick up 😂
Scam calls a lot ma. It’s very normal now
To ask my brother paynow him money
But the email put the no. Oso start with 218.. hmmm
The money allegedly is from his classmate’s scam on others
Only those got media reporting then they wayang
I’m lost. Ur brother paynow him  then why the money is from his classmate?
He ask the victim to paynow to my brother
My brother got no idea what was this money for
I see if the no. Call again ... 😁
His classmate told him to transfer him the money to him
So my brother be middleman lor
Like that video i share in our group....😅
Talk like as if he is very big shot
The cow is the middleman 😁
Then a few months later i help my brother call the IO to ask when will his bank account be reinstated
Well… Got bad apples in every job. A bit not fair to say they useless in general.
Keep pushing this away to court or bank
How would the police know when the bank account be reinstated?
He also not working in the bank
We duno who to ask ma
So we of cos ask him first
If he said not his side just say so
Initially he said please call back again in duno how many weeks
And the IO hard to get hold of him
Probably underpaid to deal with all the shits. 😂😂
My friend kena the IO very helpful
Huh y block? In response to my police report leh
6am+  say assign to amk branch. 8am say assign to tp 😂
Sorry I'll never ans +65 calls All will be blocked🤣🤣🤣
That’s what my friend told me lol
Now tsf my case to another chinese guy lolI wonder spf email tio hacker si bo? Y keep spam my email.. in 1 hr +  3 diff IO assign lol
Wow u also lag ? Lol
Haha but u reply the fake call msg ard 2am+
I never read before 12am msg haha
I just saw the 2am message
Haha my frd also cannot get
See one time heart pain one time
Saw my frd post this last night b4 i slp 😅
Frog leg porridge.. dunno at where de
Eat this definitely will warm stomach. Shiok
